attributes.action: Put a picture of a Gurkha on the back of a £50.00 note.
attributes.additional_details: It proves that all races and religions have fought for this country.
attributes.background: Shows all races and religions have fought for uk

rejection.details:
Bank notes are the responsibility of the Bank of England, which is independent of the Government and Parliament. 

You can find out how the Bank decides who will be on bank notes here: 

https://www.bankofengland.co.uk/banknotes/banknote-characters
